meanings.definition: A safety belt or harness worn in a vehicle to secure a person in their seat.
meanings.sent1: I always make sure to fasten my seatbelt before the car moves.
meanings.sent2: The flight attendant reminded everyone to fasten their seatbelts during takeoff.
meanings.sent3: The seatbelt saved the day when the car suddenly stopped.
meanings.sent4: Her seatbelt of determination kept her grounded during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The bright red seatbelt contrasted with the dark interior of the car.

meanings.definition: A strap or belt used to secure a person in a seat or chair.
meanings.sent1: The rollercoaster had a sturdy seatbelt for added safety.
meanings.sent2: She adjusted the seatbelt on the swing to make sure it was snug.
meanings.sent3: The seatbelt on the office chair made it feel like a spaceship.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty was the seatbelt that kept the team together through challenges.
meanings.sent5: The old seatbelt had a nostalgic smell of adventures past.
